items.sentence: Tom obviously wasn't expecting us to be here.
Tom needs to spend the night in the hospital.
Tom's abrupt manner puts a lot of people off.
She's not a regular employee of this company.
Tom is putting his pens into the pencil case.
What happened to Tom will be explained later.
I don't understand Tom's obsession with guns.
Tom isn't twice Mary's age, but he almost is.
Tom isn't Mary's son-in-law. He's her nephew.
Tom isn't going to be back until next Monday.
